title: vents
description: Give vol-au-vents a modern feel with a choice of pulled pork and spicy chicken fillings.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 4.5cm/1¾in crinkled cookie cutter and a 3cm/1¼in round cookie cutter.
ingredients: 1 large free-range egg, for egg wash
300g/10½oz boneless chicken thighs, chopped into small pieces
1 small green pepper, seeds removed and roughly chopped
2 small green bird's-eye chillies, seeds removed and finely chopped
2cm/¾in fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
